name: The Crystal Vial
description: A delicate crystal vial containing a flickering luminescent orb, which casts an ethereal glow on the surrounding shelves, illuminating forgotten passages in the tomes.

name: The Melodic Candle
description: A candle with a wooden holder that is now charred, its once-peaceful glow replaced by a darkened, smoldering ember effect, and bears witness to the intense heat and flames it has been used to unleash.
